title: The Dram
text: The Dram is the universal currency of Aetheria. A 'Dram' is a standardized weight of crystallized mana. Unlike gold, which has no intrinsic value, a Dram can be consumed to restore a small amount of mana, making it a commodity with practical use. Inflation is controlled by the simple fact that people literally eat their money when times are tough or when in desperate need of mana during combat.
